title: Are authors in Japan as famous and respects as in the US? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes YES! Authors win acclaim and people follow their private lives with great avidity. I come from a different generation (I am 64) so I do not know much about recent authors. But the ones that I read in college, from the 1950s and 60s, have all been lionized, complete with biographies about themselves. (And some led some really interesting lives… )
